item.title: [SOLR-11235] Some SolrCore metrics should check if core is closed before reporting
item.description:

The reason is that at the moment when these particular metrics were retrieved the core has already been closed. In such situations we should return no value (null or 0).
item.summary: Some SolrCore metrics should check if core is closed before reporting

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This patch prevents AlreadyClosedException when retrieving metrics from an already closed core. It also closes metric reporters earlier during SolrCore.close().
